content:
BuildFinishedEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle the BuildFinished event of a build.

In this Article

public delegate void BuildFinishedEventHandler(object sender, BuildFinishedEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
BuildFinishedEventHandler
